Sun Source Energy

Get Quotes
We have successfully installed over 1,500 solar fittings in homes across the USA, and we want to help you save money each year also!

At Sun Source Energy, we make the whole process of switching to Solar SIMPLE.

We completely remove you from the process, so you're completely hands off throughout the whole process from start to finish.

Everything from the roofing, engineering, installments, software and monitoring to make sure everything works from day 1, we've got you covered.

Our installation process has been refined so well over the years, it allows us to start & install your whole solar setup, within only 2 weeks.

About Sun Source Energy

  • Overview
  • Services
  • Team
  • Partners
  • Warranties & Certifications

Overview

Sun Source was founded in 2017 by two brothers with a passion for customer service. From humble beginnings, they quickly scaled a passionate six-man team to over 100 employees across Nevada, California, Arizona, Florida, and Texas. With a focus on high-quality training and customer service, Sun Source is expanding into a regional leader. This is done with a focus on morally sound business practices while providing a unique workplace for the new-age workers.
Year Established
2017
Phone Number
7023708544
Reasons Why You Should Work With Us

  1. customer service

  2. informative

  3. family owned not corporate bureaucracy

Approved installers passed our rigorous screening criteria for experience, licensing, and positive reviews.

We speak

Chinese; English; Spanish; Tagalog

Services

There is a massive opportunity for you to take advantage RIGHT NOW, which is the ability to get solar installed in your home, with a 0 ZERO DOWN DEPOSIT, allowing you to start saving on your bills each month, without having to spend on upfront costs to get setup. You just make the decision and well handle the rest from installation to maintenance all hands-off for you!

Services Offered

  • Installation
  • Financing
  • Energy Auditing
  • Roofing
  • Electrical Contracting
  • Solar Repair & Maintenance

Team

Sun Source Energy is a collection of professionals who pride themselves on being sharp as a tack, informative, and pleasant. We frown on selling unnecessary panels for large systems and things that don't make sense for the end-user.
